snippet.title: Cubin - Steam Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist Cubin on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2952340/Cubin/

Cubin is a first-person puzzle-platform game that immerses you in the LGA experience. During your journey, you'll meet Alice, who will help and guide you through the finer points of the experience. Pick up the gravity cube and interact with the control room to complete and pass through a new, ever more complex experiment.

Prepare to think, glide, fly, explode and also encounter failure. Discover yourself, who you really are on this adventure, how far you can go...
At the same time, discover what lies behind this rather dubious experiment.


Music: Fuzzeke
